inclusion.criterion: Meets European criteria proposed by the American-European Consensus Group for primary
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Has 1 or more of the following symptoms of Sjogren's syndrome: fatigue; joint pain;
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis and ICH, but no recent symptoms. No known coronary artery disease or severe congestive heart failure.
